articles.author: Lottie Elizabeth Johnson
articles.title: National Pi Day deals 2022: Where can you get deals on pie, pizza? - Deseret News
articles.description: March 14 is the day we load up on pizza and pie to honor the mathematical constant pi
articles.content:
Pi Day has arrived.
March 14 is the day we load up on pizza and pie to honor the mathematical constant pi. Heres a list of several deals running on Pi Day this year.
